com.software.reuze

Class gb_StrategySubdivisionDisplacement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.gb_a_StrategySubdivision
      • com.software.reuze.gb_StrategySubdivisionDisplacement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    gb_StrategySubdivisionDisplacementMidpoint, gb_StrategySubdivisionDisplacementNormal

    public abstract class gb_StrategySubdivisionDisplacement
extends gb_a_StrategySubdivision
    Abstract parent class for all displacement subdivision strategies. It adds common support for the displacement amplification value, which subclasses can utilize.
